column1: * 1917 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to the War Office.
* 1929 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to E.V. Gordon (2 January 1929).
* 1965 - The thirteenth episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
* 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Otto B. Lindhardt.
* 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Peyton Moss.
* 1972 â€“ In honour of his 80th birthday the following day
column2: The Sunday Times Magazine (2 January 1972) runs an interview of William Cater with J.R.R. Tolkien

column1: * 2004 - The Art of The Return of the King is published.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Complete Visual Companion is published.
*Conclusion of the six-day Yuletide festival in the Shire Calendar.
